caption.center: DWAYNE Y. HERNANDEZ, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.800 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Sumter County, William H. Hallman, III, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Dwayne Ybarra Hernandez, Wewahitchka, pro se.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Anthony J. Golden, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
PALMER, C.J., LAWSON and COHEN, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
